Articles.Content:
Hey there folks.

As many of you, I\'m having loads of fun creating various spacecrafts who would often defy laws of physics in our world but oh well we are in another world with KSP right? Big props to all the modders out there keeping me Interested in the game. KSP looks promising considering all upcoming features and posibilities will give this game incredible depth. It\'s like playing Lego again! Here are some of my ships:

- Kerbal Space Station -

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PTqXRUTBwEg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

- Mun Rover -

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IQ-xgGC-bug?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

- Mun Base -

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ULS4_tnwgaI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Nice kss. Welcome to the forum.

These are the best videos I have seen so far !! Congatulations tsunam ! 

Nice music, nice atmosphere, nice profile, nice work, nice introduction....

( this may be my first post, but i am reading the forum since 6 months almost every day, so i have seen a lot untill now ! )
Nicely done videos, and the space station is awesome

Thanks for the nice feedbacks guys!

Added Mun base video

Nice videos.

Epic use of Pilot Wings music.
